chapters.title: first chapter
story: When Karl was 8 year old he wanted to become a programer
But he didnt know about programing anything.
His parrents decided to send him to school. Which school should he take?

chapters.title: Hradec chapter
story: Karel started studying at Hradec university. He met people around OpenStack.
Karel started working with OpenContrail SDN technology and it ruined his life.
That is end of karel story.

chapters.title: Charles chapter
story: Karel started studyin at Charles university.
He never finised the school, because it was too tough for him.
Karel become bricklayer, married Tereza and is happy now.
That is end of karel story.

chapters.title: Oxford chapter
story: Karel finished studies at Oxford university.
Then he moved to Silicon Valey, and started working as programmer for Facebook.
He rent a garage and works 14 hours every day to survive.
That is end of karel story.
